body: Sorry about the delay. I did want to test out the patch but didn't get the chance earlier. Could you also look into the following directory jamon/org/trafodion/dcs/tmpl and particularly ServerStatusTmpl.jamon and check if similar changes are needed there ( I looked at the link for Home ) ?

@ryzuo Could you please work on Steve's suggestion and make the corresponding change?  Let Steve know the new location under TOOLSDIR so that he can install icu without prefix. The location of icu installation is specified in sqenvcom.sh and LocalSettingsTemplate.sh via ICU - it's current value is $TOOLSDIR/icu4.4.

Do also check on the document source Trafodion_Client_Installation_Guide.xml for removing the suffix.
Code looks OK to me but it is beyond my area of expertise. Is there someone with transaction background who can review and give thumbs up?
Thanks for the changes, this should work very nicely now.
Thanks for removing the unwanted messages
The version also has to be changed in dcs/src/test/jdbc_test/src/test/java/org/trafodion/jdbc_test/TestBasic.java for JDBC to tests to pass.
Thanks for the quick response on making the RAT license check happy.
jenkins, retest -- static check fixed by PR143
jenkins, retest -- static check fixed by PR143
Change looks good to me. Thanks you. Will merge in by tomorrow if there are no other comments.

Roberta, I see this in the logs. Maybe an expected file change is needed? I don't know where the expected file/code is though.

Arvind, Kevin : Is this PR ready to be merged? I could not determine from conversation here if any further action by author or reviewer is required now. Thank you all.

Yes, I changed the test but forgot to change the expected file.  Let me fix
this.

```
Roberta
```

The tests are self verifying.  There are two places that need to be changed
in this test when version numbers are changed.

We may want to make process easier, instead of hard coding the versions in
the test, get the hardcoded versions from someplace else.


I'm offline currently but the last comment by me was to make changes in the other files so that the links on all pages use the underlying IP address, to be consistent with the current change.

-----Original Message-----

Sent: ‎10/‎23/‎2015 7:29 AM

Cc: "arvind-narain" narain.arvind@gmail.com
Subject: Re: [incubator-trafodion] [TRAFODION-1540] Replace host name with IPaddress (#136)

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
Looks good to me. Might be good for another pair of eyes to look at it.
Thank you Dave. I will fix it in my next delivery.

Thanks for the update. With the version change another place to touch would be the exe file TFODBC64-1.2.0.exe.

@hegdean - could you please go through the recent change and comment ? If after the version change you think everything is ok @sureshsubbiah could help in merging ? I have been offline for some time and will be for next couple of days.

Looks like you changed <version> in rest/pom.xml and dcs/pom.xml, but not <package.version>.
I think both values need to change in both pom files.
Looks like I missed a place for version updates.  Will fix this also.
Looks good to me, with a few small comments. Thanks for making the message printed out by sqenvcom.sh better and more useful!

Suresh/Arvind, it's fine to merge since it's an enhancement. More than the files that Arvind mentioned should be made. So the changes will be made in the another coming pull-request. i'm busy on SPJ which seems to be more urgent.

Suresh, Arvind, All changes are made in this pull-request. Feel free to merge it. i have confirmed with installation guys for looking up IP by host name. Since mappings must store in /etc/hosts, the changes are more easy. By the way, it also applies for singleton Trafodion instance.
Can one of the committers verify this patch?
Thanks Kevin. Looks good now. Suresh - could you please merge this in ?
Thanks for handling the version change and catching the missing copyright.
@ryzuo do please comment on any progress made on this pull request - thanks.

Reverting the data type of maxRows to short and the related change to limit the maxRows size to 32767 looks ok. However, please consider changing it to int in a future check-in to accommodate more than 32767 rows in a buffer.
Can one of the committers verify this patch?
Can one of the committers verify this patch?

@arvind-narain We realized, that might because the functions of ICU have suffix Nv44 as well while the libs were built with the suffix option... Do please double check the .so files with nm, they might have Nv44 suffix. Thus, soft link does not work, you might need to build the ICU libs without suffix option to make it work. My system has 2 editions coexist when I tested that.
![capture](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7919914/10747920/a36ff6f2-7c95-11e5-817e-8518177531b0.JPG)

Changes look good to me. 

Some minor changes which can be addressed in the next release, 
1. During the build step instead of generating the DLLs in c:\lib you can generate them in C:\Build\winodbc64\lib  folder
2. The driver and folder name contains 1.0 in its name and this can be confusing with the product version number 

Will open a JIRA for the above 2 changes

@ryzuo We did that build without the suffix on the last go-around, but did have to put them in the same directory ($TOOLSDIR/icu4.4/linux64/lib).  It did not work, which is why I suggested using a directory path different than icu4.4, so that both can co-exist completely separately.
Looks perfect. Since this change needed to get nightly tests to pass, I will merge by tonight if there are no issues found in the next 3 hrs.
Change looks good to me. Merging.
Yes Roberta. Go ahead and merge.  Will submit a JIRA for the remaining work
